metadata.title: Explorez où nous opérons
metadata.description: Cliquez sur un marqueur pour voir les stades et enceintes que nous accompagnons pour leur restauration grand public
metadata.filter_label: Cliquez pour filtrer par type d'événement

venues.name: Stade Jean Bouin
venues.description: The Stade Jean Bouin is a multipurpose stadium in the 16th arrondissement of Paris, France. The 20,000 capacity facility serves as the home stadium for rugby union team Stade Français and the football club Paris FC.

venues.name: Groupama Stadium
venues.description: The Groupama Stadium is a stadium in Décines-Charpieu, a suburb of Lyon, France. It is the home ground of Ligue 1 club Olympique Lyonnais. With a seating capacity of 59,186, it is the third-largest football stadium in France.

venues.name: Stade Vélodrome
venues.description: The Stade Vélodrome is a multi-use stadium in Marseille, France. It is home to the Olympique de Marseille football club of Ligue 1. The stadium is the largest club ground in France and the second largest in the country.

venues.name: Hellfest
venues.description: Hellfest is a French rock and metal festival that takes place annually in Clisson. It is one of the largest music festivals in France and one of the biggest heavy metal festivals in Europe, attracting over 60,000 visitors daily.
